title: Cotels launches new apart-hotel style apartments in Luton
text:
Cotels launches new apart-hotel style apartments in Luton Cotels launches new apart-hotel style apartments in Luton Details Category: Hotel   12:00 Cotels has announced the opening of their very first apart-hotel style apartments in Luton Based in the town centre, these newly built apartments will offer the perfect retreat after a hard day as well as saving money on travel spend. 
Each apartment has an open-plan layout offering lots of light, complimented by modern fixtures and fittings. There is a fully equipped kitchenette, stylish high quality en-suite shower room and dining/living space with a work desk, pc, unlimited high speed Wi-Fi access and lots of storage. There are no extras for utility bills, the linen/towels or the weekly maid service and as is standard with the Cotels brand, there’s also a complimentary welcome pack on arrival that includes a few breakfast goodies and fresh milk. Other services on offer at London Park House include a games room, garden and relaxation areas, cinema room, fitness gym and meeting rooms. The welcoming reception is manned 24 hours a day so you can check in on day of the week, at any time of day. The building is located in the heart of Luton town centre so offers a host of amenities and venues close-by, including the University of Bedfordshire,‘The Mall’ shopping centre and London Luton Airport. You can even reach London Euston in just 20 mins by train. MD, Marcia Gomez says; “ We are delighted to be able to offer these stylish studio apartments at London Park House to compliment our popular 2 bed apartments at ‘The Academy’. The apart-hotel style building (the first in our portfolio) will suit the needs of business and leisure travellers alike and will offer our guests not only fantastic apartments at a great rate, but also the many additional recreational facilities that they will be able to enjoy. With London being so easily accessible these apartments will be great as a money-saving opportunity for commuters too.” Established for over 18 years, Cotels is a leading provider of executive serviced apartments now operating over 60 high quality apartments at 8 developments across Milton Keynes, Northampton & Luton.
